LanguageData.VCE_ParaceramuffaloBrie.label: paraceramuffalo brie
LanguageData.VCE_ParaceramuffaloBrie.description: A delicious cheese that takes a VERY long time to ripen. Paraceramuffalo Brie is certainly worth the wait, being one of the most nutritive cheeses in the Rim.
